list.notice: You'll need to apply for benefits with each agency.
We don't share, save, or submit your information.

list.item: For full eligibility and requirements visit each agency providing the benefit.
Modifying your responses and completing more questions may open your eligibility to other benefits.

chevron.heading: Your potential benefits
chevron.description: Visit each agency to find true eligibility and to apply. Check with your city, state, or employer for other benefits.

eligible.heading: Results
eligible.description: You may be eligible for these benefits:

chevron.heading: Benefits you did not qualify for
chevron.description: According to your answers you are not eligible for these benefits.

notEligible.heading: Results
notEligible.description: Based on your answers you are not eligible for these benefits.You may become eligible if you enter additional information or your situation changes.

eligibleResults.heading: Results
eligibleResults.description: You may be eligible for these benefits.

notEligibleResults.heading: Benefits you did not qualify for
notEligibleResults.description: Based on your answers you are not eligible for these benefits. You may become eligible if you enter additional information or your situation changes.
notEligibleResults.cta: See benefits you did not qualify for

shareResults.heading: Share results
shareResults.description: Copy or email these results. Your answers will be visible. Only share with those you trust.

shareResults.heading: Share results
shareResults.description: Your information will be viewable. Only share with those you trust.

date.alert: Date should follow the format January 19 2000
